scripts.dev: npm run version && npx -p typescript tsc --watch
scripts.build: npm run version && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: ls -l node_modules | grep @hop; ls -l ../../node_modules | grep @hop; npx -p typescript tsc
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm test && npm run publish:latest
scripts.bump: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run version:bump && npm run version:sync
scripts.bump-release: npm run version:bump && npm run version:sync && npm run release
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build:browser
scripts.docs:markdown: npm run clean:docs && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --hideGenerator --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --disableSources --hideBreadcrumbs --namedAnchors --out docs src/index.ts
scripts.docs:concat: npm run clean:docs && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --hideGenerator --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --disableSources --hideBreadcrumbs --namedAnchors --out docs src/index.ts && npx concat-md --toc --decrease-title-levels --dir-name-as-title docs > docs/README.md
scripts.docs:ui: npm run clean:docs-ui && typedoc --out docs-ui src/index.ts
scripts.docs: npm run docs:ui && npm run docs:markdown
